name: Speedy Square (prototype)
description:
A game about a square that moves fast......

Controls:

A and D to move

W and space to jump

hold shift while moving to boost or increase movement speed

P to pause

My first game , hope you enjoy it :) Support the game if you liked it.

Credits: Music : Eucalyptus by Neo Nomen
